data.name: Realms of Conquest
data.detailed_description:
Early Beta Access

Starting soon we will be having our initial Closed Beta test of the game! Head on over to our website at: http://realmsofconquest.com to sign up!


About the Game

It has been 150 years since the Creator unleashed his wrath with the Sundering — the cataclysm that altered the face of the world and set the stage for war. Now is the time to rewrite history once more as four powerful factions — the Human Kingdom, the Orc Tribes, the Undead Horde, and the Demonic Ascended — gather forces for a final, titanic clash.

Amass your army of fearless warriors, mythical beasts, and devastating war machines, and confront the foes who would destroy you in high-stakes campaigns across the fantasy world of Erenar. Your tenacity and tactical mastery as battlefield commander will mean the difference between the salvation and ruin of your people. Between total victory and utter annihilation.

These are the times when heroes are made and legends are born. These are the Realms of Conquest.

Realms of Conquest is a turn-based PC Wargame where you collect, build, customize, and command armies playing head-to-head battles online.

Tabletop Meets Desktop - Enjoy an authentic tabletop gaming experience enhanced with the power of video games. Watch as your armies spring to life with rich sound, visual effects, and animations.

Easy to Play, Challenging to Master - Intuitive and simple controls get you into the action quickly. A deep and nuanced battle system, along with an ever-growing community of skilled players offers plenty of challenging fun.

Build and Customize Your Army - Create an army that suits your unique command style. With an always expanding selection of troops, you can craft the perfect force to answer any threat.

All Action, No Grind - Enjoy fast and bloody conflicts and battle-focused play. No fighting with dice, figuring out the math or looking up rules.

data.short_description: Realms of Conquest is a turn-based PC Wargame where you collect, build, customize, and command armies playing head-to-head battles online.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 960M or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 9080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
